Html:
Is for now possible to run any process after TS file compile with Visual Studio plugin (after save, and after compilation)?
I used Web Essential extensin that generated minified version of compiled JS, but for now TS support is dropped and it looks like that there is not automated way to generate minified file this way. I also know that there is a plan to support minification in the future.
For now i think that there should be possibility to run any process after compilation (in VS plugin). This will give as possibility to automaticaly genereate mified code with custom libraries ad so on.
